#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cctype>
#include<cmath>
#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>

#define S(t); scanf("%d",&t);
#define Sl(t); scanf("%lld",&t);
#define P(t); printf("%d\n",t);
#define Pl(t); printf("%lld\n",t);
#define REP(i,n) for(i=0; i<n; i++)
#define MAXN 1010
#define MOD 100000007



using namespace std;


typedef long long int llint;

int main()
{
    int i,j,t,n,a[20],b[20],n1,n2;
    
    S(t);
    while(t--)
    {
      S(n1);
      S(n2);
      
      int r, k=0, l=0;
      
      while(n1 != 0)
      {
          r=n1%10;
          a[k]=r;
          k++;
          n1 /= 10;
      }
      
      while(n2 != 0)
      {
          r=n2%10;
          b[l]=r;
          l++;
          n2 /= 10;
      }
      
      sort(a,a+k);
      sort(b,b+l);
      
      
      for(i=0; i<k; i++)
      {
          if(a[i] != b[i])
          break;
      }
      
      if(i==k)
      printf("1\n");
      else
      printf("0\n");
      
    }
    return 0;
}
